name: MyOfficeGuide
0:
”Alexa, open the office guide”
”Alexa, start the office guide”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the office guide
des:
Welcome your guests with a guide to your office. They can open the skill and say "Alexa, where is the doctor?" and Alexa will answer, so if you're busy, the guest is able to know it, and can buzz you to make his presence known, so you don't make him or her waiting for a long time.

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
